name: Accept-All Email Detection
description: We find which addresses are associated with Accept-All servers so you can assess the risk in sending to those addresses.

name: SMTP Provider Information
description: Automatically determine the email provider that each email address is using.

name: Syntax Validation
description: Ensures the address has all the characteristics of a legitimate email address before you send.

name: Domain Validation
description: Checks that the domain name hosting the email address actually exists and is working properly.

name: Email Quality Score
description: We give every email address on your list a quality score from 0 to 100.

name: Customized Exports
description: Handpick and export only the email addresses you want to send to with ease.

name: Real-Time Results
description: View the results of your email verification as we process the list in real-time.

name: Name & Gender Detection
description: Our system attempts to enrich emails in your list with a first and last name  and the gender of emails in your list.

name: Drag & Drop Interface
description: Easily drag and drop or copy and paste your email list directly from your computer.

name: 24/7 Support
description: We're here to help! Our friendly staff is available to answer questions through chat and email.
